name: Baby
greetingText: Welcome to the first part of your birthday present!
wishText: May you find peace and happiness today and always!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday baby!  I hope you're having an incredible day.  I love you so so so much and I can't wait to marry you!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are so special to me <3
outroText: Hi Darling! I hope you liked this! I've been trying to figure out a fun way to celebrate your birthday while you are studying abroad. Short of flying over there and spending some quality time with you in person, I hope this has been a good start to your birthday day! I love you to the moon and back, my darling, and I can't wait to video call with you later! Don't forget to grab a cupcake or some gummies for us to share later this evening! Follow this link for part 2 of your birthday gift!
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
